description: Count words containing letter A and having more vowels than consonants

test_cases.name: Example from problem 1
test_cases.input: ABCAAAAACBA and CBAABC are simple palindromes while AAABC and ABCAA are not

test_cases.name: Example from problem 2
test_cases.input: Aoxomoxoa is an album by the Grateful Dead

test_cases.name: Words with A but more consonants
Single character words
test_cases.input: A B C a e i o u

test_cases.name: Complex sentence
test_cases.input: Amazing achievements are always appreciated by audiences
